message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15000. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This represents an exceptional opportunity for you to acquire a product that matches your needs and expectations at a discounted rate. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences. Looking forward to your positive response.
